feed.title: Fwd: Live mtgox.com trade matching bug.

entry.title: Fwd: Live mtgox.com trade matching bug.
entry.summary: In 2011, Mike Hearn requested to keep the Mt Gox related discussions off bitcoin-development as it was not directly related to the core software. However, someone argued that MtGox's code is just as relevant as BitcoinJ or any other Bitcoin software.
